xwikidoc.name: WebHome
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
The bibliography application allows to manager biliographic data on XWiki.
The current available actions are :
* [[Import from BibTex/BibLaTeX>>doc:Bibliography.Code.ImportBibTeX]] * [[Create a person>>doc:Bibliography.Code.CreatePerson]] * [[Create an entry>>doc:Bibliography.Code.CreateEntry]] * [[Search for an entry>>doc:Bibliography.Data.Entries.WebHome]] * [[Search for a person>>doc:Bibliography.Data.Persons.WebHome]] * [[Merge two persons>>doc:Bibliography.Code.MergePersons]] * [[List the indexed spaces>>doc:Bibliography.Code.ListIndexedSpaces]] * [[View configuration>>doc:Bibliography.Configuration.Configuration]] * [[View entry types>>doc:Bibliography.Code.EntryTypes]]
(((
)))
